definition: to fold/to fold over in layers/to furl/to layer/to pile up/to repeat/to duplicate

sentences.english: This is the first report of Triassic Radiolaria within the Yarlung-Zangbo Suture Zone.
sentences.chinese: 這是雅魯藏布江縫合帶三疊紀放射蟲的首次報告。

sentences.english: This was towards the end of the Triassic period.
The Qinling orogenic belt was formed from the Late Paleozoic to the Triassic.
sentences.chinese: 秦嶺造山帶形成於晚古生代至三疊紀。

sentences.english: In the Triassic period, following the collision between North-China and South-China cratons, the Tanlu fault zone was formed.
sentences.chinese: 三疊紀，華南與華北克拉通碰撞，郯廬斷裂帶形成。
